name: Commanders (itch)
description:
Play in fullscreen.

Left click:

- Select unit.

- Select tile to move to.

- Select tile to attack to.

Hold right click:

- Show opponent move and attack range.

Spacebar:

- Skip unit movement or attack.

Fighter and tank units can move and attack on the same turn.

Archer can only move or attack on a turn.

Game is on development, for more info check the devlogs.
